title: Boards: Preview + Editing Update

embed.description: Performance Issues on the updated Summoner's Rift

body:
Belated happy Thanksgiving all!

Here to bring you another update on Boards. Earlier this week we rolled out a fix for preview and editing of comments. One of the key pieces of feedback we heard was that creating comments and seeing their previews was distracting, if not too similar — especially when editing. The output was also different than the text entry. 

FYI: this rollout seems to have introduced a few bugs which our team are actively working to squash. 

Also continuing update on features and fixes we are working . The Quoting + Reply improvements are next and may be pushed out as soon as next week, depending on QA and bugs (no promises but we're working hard to get it to you). This should help with the clarity of who was quoted along with conversations in both Discussion and Chrono views. 

See below for the other items we've got on our list and as always leave questions or feedback in the comments below:

* Quoting & Replying Update — *(soon tm)*
* ~~Character Limit Evaluation (Comments + Discussion)~~ **DONE**
* Formatting Update — *In progress*
* Improvements to Comments — *In progress, part 1 rollout done*
* Update to the Red Tracker
* Pagination / Endless Scrolling
* Bug Fixes — *Ongoing*
* Continued Clarity Adjustments — *In Progress*
* Search improvements
* Mobile improvements — NEW

replies.body:
Any plans to introduce a few different colour schemes you can choose between... or the ability to customize the colour scheme in general?

This colour scheme is really depressing.

The team doesn't currently have plans to support multiple / alternate color schemes though it will likely evolve over time. Currently there are options like the [updated FEK that allow for infinite customization.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/cg2zx6Ey-fek-30-preview)

> The team doesn't currently have plans to support multiple / alternate color schemes though it will likely evolve over time. Currently there are options like the [updated FEK that allow for infinite customization.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/cg2zx6Ey-fek-30-preview)

Sadly, I access the boards from many locations, most of which I have limited to no control over(such as my work computer), and thus 'options like FEK' do me no good. The options need to be built into the website or else they do me no good. Please PLEASE consider this as a major flaw of these boards, since I see colour scheme as a criticism posted on a daily basis.
What kind of mobile improvements are planned? Because for me the main problem is the dark color scheme. If there's any kind of sunlight the boards after impossible to read/see.
Mobile Improvements do not include color scheme changes. It will be more along the lines of smarter breakpoints and support for reading the Boards on different screen sizes.
